<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Reach Beyond](/Feats.aspx?ID=2711) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #166: Despair on Danger Island](/Sources.aspx?ID=85) pg. 79</row>

**Archetype** [Ghost Eater](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=92)

**Prerequisites**
[Ghost Eater Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2710)

</column>

---

You've learned to move your spiritual energy past yourself to attack spirits where others can't. You can make melee Strikes against [incorporeal](/Traits.aspx?ID=222) creatures that are inside solid objects as long as the object is within your reach. An incorporeal creature inside of a solid object is [hidden](/Conditions.aspx?ID=22), requiring you to succeed at a DC 11 flat check when you target it. You can spend an action, which has the [concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32) trait, to focus on a creature inside of a solid object. If you do, the next melee Strike you make this turn requires you to succeed at only a DC 6 flat check to affect the creature.
name: Reach Beyond
